item.title: Securely handling libffi
item.description: I've recently came across libffi again. No, not because it was mentioned during the Gentoo Hardened online meeting, but because my /var/tmp wasn't mounted correctly, and emerge (actually python) uses libffi. Most users won't notice this, because libffi works behind the scenes. But when it fails, it fails bad …
